items.name: Sweet as Sugar by Teleflora
items.description: A Mirrored Silver Cube vase is just one of the things that makes this beautiful bouquet such a sweet gift. It's full of beautiful flowers that are perfectly hand-arranged for maximum impact.
items.arrangement: Lovely lavender hydrangea, roses, alstroemeria, stock and freesia arrive in a magical Mirrored Silver Cube. As sweet as a sugar cube!

items.name: Teleflora's Pleasing Pastels Bouquet
items.description: Pleasing as can be! This Mother's Day, delight her with this gorgeous, cherry quartz-inspired art glass vase, bursting with pastel roses, hydrangea and lilies.
items.arrangement: White hydrangea, lavender roses, pink spray roses, pink asiatic lilies, pink alstroemeria, lavender stock and lavender cushion spray chrysanthemums are arranged with sword fern, leatherleaf fern, and huckleberry. Delivered in a Pink 'n Peach Paradise vase.

items.name: Teleflora's Vivid Love Bouquet
items.description: Rich and radiant, this vivid mix of jewel-toned blooms is wrapped with leaves for modern style, but its message of love is timeless.
items.arrangement: Maroon carnations, purple button spray chrysanthemums, and lavender seafoam statice are accented with seeded eucalyptus, leatherleaf fern, pitta negra, huckleberry, and variegated aspidistra leaf. Delivered in a Clear Glass Cylinder Vase.

items.name: Teleflora's Winged Whimsy Bouquet
items.description: Wonderfully whimsical, this keepsake butterfly vase and poetic purple bouquet have a vintage style that mom is sure to love!
items.arrangement: Purple alstroemeria, miniature lavender carnations, purple daisy spray chrysanthemums, lavender cushion spray chrysanthemums and purple sinuata statice are arranged with leatherleaf fern and parvifolia eucalyptus. Delivered in Teleflora's Vintage Butterfly Cube.

items.name: Pure Happiness
items.description: Pure happiness is what this pretty bouquet delivers - whether you're sending it for a fall birthday, Thanksgiving, thank you, or simply just because. Surely, no one can be in the presence of something so inherently happy and not smile.

items.name: Breathtaking Beauty - 3 Dozen Long Stemmed Roses
items.description: One, two, three! Three dozen spectacularly gorgeous red roses delivered in a dazzling flared glass vase - positive proof that love is a many-splendored thing. Imagine her loving this amazing bouquet day after day. Hero-worshipping time.

items.arrangement: A dozen red roses with garden greens are hand-delivered in a fashionable Couture Vase. Classic and romantic.

items.name: Teleflora's Sunny Day Pitcher of Joy
items.description: Symbolizing warmth and happiness, it is no wonder the sunflower is a quintessential ingredient in so many fall bouquets. This bouquet maximizes the joy of sunflowers by arranging them with a bevy of fall flowers, it's a lovely pick-me-up for a crisp fall day.
items.arrangement: Sunny sunflowers, red roses and miniature carnations, bronze daisy spray chrysanthemums, large lavender monte cassino asters and autumn greens are beautifully arranged in a ceramic vase.
